fields.label: Link to Book/Article
fields.name: custom_ba_url
fields.instructions:
Input in a specific url (e.g. http://....)
Next, select or upload a suitable Featured Image

fields.label: Book/Article description
fields.name: custom_ba_desc
fields.instructions: Optional text to describe Book/Article, max. 120 characters

fields.label: Select category to show in
fields.name: custom_ba_cat
fields.instructions: Select categories to show article/book in.

fields.label: Select tags to associate article/book
fields.name: custom_ba_tag
fields.instructions: This will help with the selected categories page's dropdown options

fields.label: Category and tag group
fields.name: category_and_tag_group
fields.instructions: Tag and category required for all post type

sub_fields.label: Tags
sub_fields.name: tags
sub_fields.instructions:
Select a default tag or add on tags associated with post e.g:
'All methods' on normal post type and
'Product' for product post type

sub_fields.label: Category
sub_fields.name: categories
sub_fields.instructions:
Select a default category or add on categories associated with post e.g:
'Stories' on post under stories and
'Feature xxx' for feature block type

sub_fields.label: Specific category for post
sub_fields.name: display_category
sub_fields.instructions: If multiple categories, specify a category for the post (seen on Homepage as category type on card)

fields.label: Content section
fields.name: contact_top_section
fields.instructions: Content for contact page

sub_fields.label: Image or icon on left
sub_fields.name: intro_image
sub_fields.instructions: Default image is Slack icon. Image dimension is fixed at max. 150px wide, height is unlimited.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: intro_title
sub_fields.default_value: Hi! Would you like to be featured on the HIVE?

title: Customize 1-Col Post (Select a default tag, e.g. All Methods)

fields.name: leftCol_group
fields.instructions: Short introduction about the project

fields.name: rightCol_group

sub_fields.label: Choose to attach link or file to image

sub_fields.label: Select an image as thumbnail in pages
sub_fields.name: rightCol_thumb
sub_fields.instructions: Image dimension of 309 x 193, appearing on card layout in pages

sub_fields.label: Select image as thumbnail for homepage

sub_fields.instructions: Image dimension of 310 x 310, appearing on card layout in homepage

fields.name: view_all
fields.instructions: Pull posts from chosen tag

fields.label: Images

fields.label: More posts
fields.name: view_all

fields.instructions: Define category/categories for page to display relevant posts under the same category

fields.label: Select page filtering options

sub_fields.name: page_filter

sub_fields.label: Sort by

sub_fields.instructions: No action required. Values are fixed.

fields.label: Select feature block options

sub_fields.label: Do you need feature blocks in page?

fields.name: page_pin_post

title: Customize Product Post (Select default tag: Product)

Select a page or post to link to, or input in a specific url (e.g. http://....)
Next, select or upload a suitable Featured Image

sub_fields.default_value: Xx research and analytics experts spread across the globe in xx locations.

fields.label: Footer logo

fields.instructions: Image used for footer, image size 280 x 47

title: Instructions
acfe_display_title:
--Note--
On default template, it can be used for Books/Articles post
For all other posts, it will need a template to be selected first, then the category (uncheck Uncategorized) and tags
Please ignore the Categories and Tags section by the side bar whenever possible, the site relies more on this section below to customise
Avoid having the same Permalink as page url e.g. if page url is hive.autodesk.com/new-abc, post Permalink/slug cannot be ...com/new-abc
To make product post, select Product template and Product tag, followed by the usual category and tags
